text: Love the view from this pit. It’s also pretty isolated from the usual crowded spots. Which is good if you like a quiet bbq experience with your own gang but also a little inconvenient as the amenities are a walk away. Walk from public carpark entrance is about 10minutes. Walk from public toilet is about 8 minutes. No nearby shaded place so if it rains, run!
Come here for the sunrise.. So a wonderful morning and full of spirit.. So beautiful in the early morning.

Surrey Hills@RafflesCity. What’s all the hype about?!?!🧐.
It was 2pm. Thought I’d bring my Mom and sister for a nice cup of coffee. Requested for a nice round table with cushions for my mom but was told it’s a 5 seater. Was led to the back next to the table where all their workers were having their lunch and next to the restroom although there were empty tables up front. Anyways the Royal Milk Tea was lukewarm !!😒BTW when we left, three people were occupying the 5seater !😑!!
The pit was really deep away from the nearest carpark or any public road.  But the scenery was nice.
Wonderful place to enjoy and walk. Have great view with the sea beach 🏝️
